mapper.select: /* StatLikeMapper.xml, StatLike.selectList, SAC 전시 , 2014-11-05 */ SELECT TENANT_ID, USER_KEY, STATS_CLSF, STATS_KEY, CNT_LIKE, CNT_BRWS, CNT_SHAR, SEQ, TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT TENANT_ID, USER_KEY, STATS_CLSF, STATS_KEY, CNT_LIKE, CNT_BRWS, CNT_SHAR, SEQ, TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT TENANT_ID, USER_KEY, STATS_CLSF, STATS_KEY, CNT_LIKE, CNT_BRWS, CNT_SHAR, SEQ, COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS_MBR_LIKE A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS B USING (TENANT_ID, STATS_CLSF, STATS_KEY) WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND USER_KEY = #{userKey} ) WHERE SEQ <= TO_NUMBER(#{startKey}) ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{count} + 1 /* select 1 more for hasNext.*/
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* StatLikeMapper.xml, Stat.insert, SAC 전시 , 2014-12-22 */ TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS_MBR_LIKE ( TENANT_ID , USER_KEY , STATS_CLSF , STATS_KEY , REG_DT , REG_ID , UPD_DT , UPD_ID , SEQ ) VALUES( #{tenantId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{userKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{clsf, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{key, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , 'SAC' , SYSDATE , 'SAC' , (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM TB_DP_SOCIAL_STATS_MBR_LIKE WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND USER_KEY = #{userKey}) )
